attributes.action: Hold a public enquiry into media scaremongering over non-existent fuel shortage.
attributes.additional_details: This has caused a national issue which was unnecessary and has now consumed unnecessary governmental and national resources which could have been better spent elsewhere. It is a misuse of a position of privilege by media outlets and social media platforms and that is grossly irresponsible.
attributes.background: The Government must hold a public enquiry into the scaremongering by the media and social media platforms which has led to the panic buying of fuel.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the content of media reporting.
